description:
#### MSEdgeRedirect
This tool filters and passes the command line arguments of Microsoft Edge processes into your default browser instead of hooking into the microsoft-edge: handler, this should provide resiliency against future changes. Additionally, an Image File Execution Options mode is available to operate similarly to the Old EdgeDeflector. Additional modes are planned for future versions.

#### False positive virus detections
MSEdgeRedirect is created using AutoIt. AutoIt EXEs are detected by a handful of virus scanners as "malicious" which is are false positive. A Detailed explanation is present here: https://www.autoitscript.com/forum/topic/34658-are-my-autoit-exes-really-infected/
summary: A Tool to Redirect News, Search, Widgets, Weather and More to Your Default Browser
author: rcmaehl
